com.example.shoutout.activity.fragment

Class TimelineFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
      • com.example.shoutout.activity.fragment.TimelineFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner

    public class TimelineFragment
extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
    Fragment that displays a collection of posts based on who the local logged-in user follows. Everything is displayed from most recent at the top to earliest at the bottom.
    Since:
    April 29, 2021

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class androidx.fragment.app.Fragment

        androidx.fragment.app.Fragment.InstantiationException, androidx.fragment.app.Fragment.SavedState

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private android.widget.Button button_morePosts
      Button that allows more posts to be displayed when the end of the timeline has been reached
      private PostFragment.IsPostLikedListener isPostLikedListener
      Listener that is called when the fragment needs to know if the local user has liked a specific post
      private android.widget.LinearLayout layout_posts
      Linear layout that contains all the instances of PostFragment
      private java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicReference<User> localUserRef
      Reference to the local logged-in user
      private UserSearchResultFragment.OnProfileClickListener onProfileClickListener
      Listener that is fired when a post's user's avatar is clicked on, directing the end user to the post's user's profile
      private java.util.List<Post> posts
      List of posts currently stored in this timeline.
      private static java.lang.String TAG
      Logging tag
      private android.widget.TextView text_loading
      Text view that displays while the fragment is fetching more posts from the server
      private android.widget.TextView text_noPosts
      Text view that displays if all users that the user is following haven't made any posts
      private android.widget.TextView text_notFollowing
      Text view that displays if the user is not following anyone
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,User> usersPool
      Allows results of user information requests to be cached, allowing for much quicker load times.

      void loadMorePosts(int limit, java.util.Date before)
      Will send a request to the database server asking for posts uploaded by those present in the local user's following list, and will update the timeline accordingly.

      • usersPool

        private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,User> usersPool
        Allows results of user information requests to be cached, allowing for much quicker load times.
        See Also:
        getUserAsync(String)

      • posts

        private java.util.List<Post> posts
        List of posts currently stored in this timeline. The 0th post will be the earliest, and the (n-1)th post will be the latest.

      • onProfileClickListener

        private UserSearchResultFragment.OnProfileClickListener onProfileClickListener
        Listener that is fired when a post's user's avatar is clicked on, directing the end user to the post's user's profile

      • getUserAsync

        private com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<User> getUserAsync(java.lang.String id)
        Asynchronously fetch a user from the database server
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the user
        Returns:
        A task returning a user, which will be null (the user, not the task) if the ID doesn't correspond to a specific user

      • loadMorePosts

        public void loadMorePosts(int limit,
                          java.util.Date before)
        Will send a request to the database server asking for posts uploaded by those present in the local user's following list, and will update the timeline accordingly.
        Parameters:
        limit - The maximum number of posts to fetch
        before - All fetched posts will have a post date before this
